songs.lyrics:
[Chorus] x2 [Kristina Allen x Yama Buddha]
Chahinchha malai kohi
Nikai eklo hunchha aaja bholi
Tyesaile man kholi, Timi malai saath deu

[Verse 1] [Yama Buddha]
Malai saath deu, malai haat deu
Malai timi gauna, haasna, bachna deu
Jivanma akansha deu, maatra aasha na deu
Maya garera dekhau, maatra bacha na deu
Jiudai mari nadeu, Chittai aati nadeu
Dherai sankha garera afthyaro pari nadeu
Himmat hari nadeu, bishwas gara hami ma
Dherai keti haru dekhe tara timi jasto kohi katai bhetina
Khoi pattai payina kahile maya basyo hamima
Aakhama rakhe timilai maya garera thakina
Angalo badhe timilai timro chahana badina
Sadai maya garchhu timilai ma kahile chaddina

[Chorus] x2 [Kristina Allen x Yama Buddha]
Chahinchha malai kohi
Nikai eklo hunchha aaja bholi
Tyesaile man kholi, Timi malai saath deu

[Verse 2] [Yama Buddha]
Maya ma timro nai ho, Satau janma vari ko
Timro prem ko pahiro le yo mero man bhariyo
Jindagi nabadliyos, bhatkeko ghar baniyo
Sapanaki rajkumari ho ki kunai pari ho
Ujyaalo muhar timro, chandrama bhanda
Mandramukta hunchhu ma kina timi maskida
Latthai hunchhu heri feri ma timro rup ranga
Timro aawaj sunera parchhu ma tyesai danga
Tyesaile aauna timi, gaauna timi
Tada gayera manlai nasatau na timi
Dubna lageko yo nau lai bachau na timi
Ma sanga gayi milera ghar basauna timi

[Chorus] x2 [Kristina Allen x Yama Buddha]
Chahinchha malai kohi
Nikai eklo hunchha aaja bholi
Tyesaile man kholi, Timi malai saath deu
songs.title: Malai Kohi
